name: The Ashtray
writer: Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (creator), Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Craig Gerard (executive story editor), Matthew Zinman (executive story editor), Dan Gregor (executive story editor), Doug Mand (executive story editor)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: A nervous Ted receives an unexpected telephone message from The Captain, his old girlfriend Zoey's wealthy ex-husband. Ted believes The Captain called to exact his revenge against him, thus he tries to avoid The Captain's follow-up call. Ted, Robin and Lily reminisce about the last time they saw The Captain a year and a half ago at an art gallery, but each remembers the evening slightly differently. As they piece together their three stories, in there may lie the real reason The Captain got back in touch with Ted, and why that evening affected one of the three so deeply. Meanwhile, Barney, who was not there that evening, tries to infiltrate himself into Ted, Robin and Lily's individual stories, while Marshall wants Ted to reconnect with The Captain on the minute possibility that Marshall will get to sail on The Captain's boat.
